name: Breakfast Tycoon
description:
All characters owned by Drawfee! This is just a fan project based on a throwaway joke in an episode.

Web version mirror here!

Food's up!

Become a 5-star breakfast restaurant owner! Start from a tiny restaurant and grow your business.

The food critic comes around every 3 days to check on your progress. (Don't worry, he's nice.) As your rating improves, your restaurant is upgraded, but so is the challenge!

CONTROLS

Arrow keys/D-pad - Move Legzi/Move menu cursor

Enter/A(Xbox)/X(PS) - Grab Ingredient/Serve Food/Select (in menus)

PgUp/PgDn - Volume up/down

NOTES
  • Great serves have two or more ingredients in the right place. Good serves have one. Bad serves have no ingredients in the right place.
  • Great serves increase your restaurant rating, bad serves decrease it. Good serves do nothing.
  • Multiple days in a row with majority Great serves makes a combo for extra restaurant rating!
CREDITS
